content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or preferences, but here are a few suggestions for places to stay during the Castle Combe Steam Rally:

1. The Castle Inn - This charming 12th century inn is located in the heart of Castle Combe village and offers comfortable rooms and a traditional pub restaurant.

2. Manor House Hotel and Golf Club - This luxury hotel is located just a short drive from Castle Combe and offers elegant rooms, fine dining, and a championship golf course.

3. snettisham park farm and camping - This family-run farm and campsite is located near Castle Combe and offers a range of accommodation options, including camping pods, bell tents, and lodges.

4. The Old House at Home - Located in Burton, this pub and inn offers comfortable rooms and a traditional pub atmosphere, as well as easy access to Castle Combe and other nearby attractions.

These are just a few options. You can also search online for more accommodations that best suit your preferences and budget.
